summary:
Hussam is Architect and Senior interior designer with 24 years’ experience in residential and commercial project ,experience in the construction industry in UAE , Syria and Ukraine, strong background in project management and innovative problem-solver, team player who is adaptable and goal-oriented and has experience in scheduling, customer relationship management, and document control. Multitasking and self-motivated leader with experience expanding network connections, persuading customers to products, implementing pricing models, inventory control and projections, distributor relations, territory development, and uncovering customer needs in order to deliver solutions. 
Specialties; 
JOB RESPONSIBILITIES & DESCRIPTION:

•Assist the client with review and approval of contractor’s submittals
•Apply knowledge of relevant International Regulations regarding the design of projects
•Perform operational support and analysis for an assigned area
•Participate in the development of specifications, policies, and procedures for the assigned area
•Ensure the design work is organized with project staff
•Apply engineering disciplines by keeping clear and frequent communication
•Review projects to ensure that applicable codes, standards, and procedures are followed and that quality is satisfactory
•Provide oversight in the development of required project scopes and cost estimates for construction contract purposes
•Prepare estimates for fees and construction contracts
•Provide technical and administrative guidance to colleagues in preparing workshop drawings and specifications
•Seek new work by marketing and giving presentations

Other Professional Roles: 
The founder and president of nonprofit organization  UKRAINIAN-EUROPEAN COUNCIL FOR HUMAN RIGHTS   - Kyiv, Ukraine 
Founder and owner  : 
- In Mood Café & Restaurant 
- Barcode Bar Kyiv 
- UKRAINE SERVICE LTD.

profile_positions.description: The Ukrainian-European Human Rights Council is an independent, non-political organization dedicated to protecting Ukrainians and citizens of other nationalities by educating them about their rights and responsibilities, as well as the legal system. The Council assists all nationalities on Ukrainian territory, advises foreign investors, protects their interests as required by Ukrainian law, and provides legal assistance to refugees seeking to integrate into Ukrainian society. UERPL supports victims of various types of fraud, sick people, and raises awareness to prevent injustice. Direct the council's activities to collaborate with Ukrainian civil society organizations, private and public institutions, international organizations operating in Ukraine, and the relevant Ukrainian government agencies that make these decisions.
profile_positions.title: Founder and president

profile_positions.description:
Ukraine Services Company is a limited liability company that provides legal and investment advice in Ukraine and is registered in Ukraine under the registration number: 43444902.
The Services company was founded at the beginning of 2019 to represent and assist investors (individuals and start-ups) in entering the Ukrainian market through an innovative approach and a set of services required for success.
We offer a wide range of services in the following categories: legal, financial, investment, marketing, business development, and more.....
Our mission is to legally assist investors and provide them with the business strategy and services needed to enter the Ukrainian market successfully, as well as to ensure a mutually beneficial project between us.
profile_positions.title: Founder and owner

profile_positions.description:
Design & More L.L.C. Was established in 2012 by Hussam  Alyamani in Kyiv Ukraine the company is a Design ,consulting and execution company, offer complete turn-key project solutions for Residential Interiors & Exterior design and Commercial Fit Out.
Working close with the local developer in Residential and Commercial project.
profile_positions.title: Chief Executive Officer

profile_positions.description:
A typical old Podil facade, retro-style lamps hanging out into the street, and a heavy black door – looks intriguing enough to drop in. It’s Barcode bar and What’s On is here to check out if this is a code worth scanning.
From the first step in you understand Barcode is about drinking – a spacious bar welcomes every visitor, while the ceiling lights are decorated with glasses and bottles set into the wall elude to the theme. The menu proves this to be true also – the array of cocktails is impressive and split into “codes” – like “old fashioned”, “sour”, “Manhattan”, and in-house Barcode specials; each style is visually explained as to its taste and strength. I notice Barcode’s own cocktail recipes seem inspired and order a Jungle Beauty right away. It comes with a large block of ice and a slice of strawberry, and I enjoy the strength of the horilka it contains, along with sour notes of lemon and delicate basil.
The food list is not extensive, but makes sure you won’t go hungry no matter how many cocktails you might have. With burgers, smorrebrods, hummus, and steaks it looks eclectic at first glance. “The food menu offers different taste experiences, something people in Kyiv are looking for,” – says Hussam, the owner of the place. He originally comes from Syria, which is why the menu has some of the best-known Arab dishes like falafel , mutabel (eggplant salad), labneh (cream-cheese balls in oil and spices), and so on. Following his advice, we are ready for a gastronomic journey.
profile_positions.title: Founder and owner

profile_positions.description: The restaurant "In Mood" serves Lebanese and Syrian cuisine and is located on Nyzhniy Val street in Kyiv's historical district. Syrian Hussam Al Yamani, an architect and interior designer, as well as the restaurant's owner , created this space. The restaurant has one hall that is divided into zones and is decorated in black and white with clear and silver accents. Pink sofas and a separate piece of decor are used. The menu features traditional Lebanese dishes such as beans, vegetables, fish, olive oil, and garlic. Oriental sweets are given special attention. Baklava, kulvushkur, Mamula, and vardatta are served to guests.
profile_positions.title: Founder and owner

profile_positions.description:
DGI Interior Was established in 2010 by Hussam Alyamani in Damascus Syria the company is a Design ,consulting and execution company, offer complete turn-key project solutions for Residential Interiors & Exterior design and Commercial Fit Out.
working with Emaar the leading developer in UAE at them project in Damascus The Eighth Gate to develop the interior design service for them projects and Four Seasons hotel Damascus boulevard
profile_positions.title: Chief Executive Officer

profile_positions.description:
DESIGN GROUP INTL L.L.C. Was established in 1998 by Hussam Alyamani in Dubai ,the company is a Design ,consulting and execution company, offer complete turn-key project solutions for Residential Interiors & Exterior design and Commercial Fit Out.
Since its inception, DGI has successfully designed more than 2,000 projects, including residential Villas, Palaces, Hotels, industrial and commercial buildings, conference rooms, hotels, government departments and interiors for the corporate sector.
Distributor for : 
 -IDL / Italian lighting 
- Archeo Venice / Italian lighting
profile_positions.title: Chief Executive Officer

profile_positions.description:
•	Interprets and evaluates client requirements
•	Develops and coordinates detailed design concepts with ability to develop functional requirements and project-design criteria
•	Demonstrates understanding of the architectural design process and integration of interior design concepts/ with ability to develop design element components
•	Collaborate on corporate interiors projects, including programming client needs, conceptual and schematic design, design development, and management of budgets and schedules
•	Participate in selection of corporate furniture systems and specifications
•	Work closely with Design Principles and SMEs across the globe to advocate an inter-disciplinary design approach and philosophy; promote integrated design approach across firm
•	Related experience is required
profile_positions.title: Interior Designer
